data.comment: Today's match is followed by 7780 spectators.
The big names in today's match at Krasnodar Stadium have now been confirmed.
The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 1, Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar attack through Evgeni Chernov. The finish is off target, however.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Volgograd a goal kick.
In the minute 3, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Volgograd get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
In the minute 5, Free kick for Volgograd in the half of Krasnodar.
Throw-in for Volgograd close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 6, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar's Ari is caught offside.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 9, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Volgograd's area.
Volgograd's Flamarion gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Krasnodar defender.
Can Volgograd capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Krasnodar's half?
In the minute 10, Throw-in Krasnodar.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Kaio Pantaleao of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 12, Volgograd have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal! Ari gives Krasnodar a 1-0 lead in Krasnodar.
In the minute 14, Evgeni Markov instrumental with a fine assist.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Krasnodar Stadium, Tonny Vilhena has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 16, Volgograd's Andres Ponce has been booked in Krasnodar.
Throw-in for Volgograd at Krasnodar Stadium.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Ilya Zhigulev of Volgograd smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Krasnodar Volgograd drive forward through Flamarion. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 20, Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Flamarion gets his shot on target but fails to score for Volgograd.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In the minute 22, Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Krasnodar.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Krasnodar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick Volgograd.
Zurab Davitashvili for Volgograd gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 27, Ruslan Kambolov for Krasnodar has been booked by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin and receives a first yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Krasnodar.
In the minute 29, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Andres Ponce (Volgograd) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
In the minute 32, Ruslan Kambolov is back on the pitch.
Throw-in Volgograd.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Attention is being given to Krasnodarâ€™s Ruslan Kambolov and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Wanderson for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick in a good position for Volgograd!
In the minute 37, Saba Kverkvelia for Volgograd drives towards goal at Krasnodar Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 37, Kamil Mullin is replacing Evgeniy Pesegov for the away team.
Krasnodar's Wanderson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Volgograd have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Volgograd throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Krasnodar push forward at Krasnodar Stadium and Shapi Suleymanov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Volgograd defence.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Krasnodar.
In the minute 40, Saba Kverkvelia (Volgograd) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Ari nets and Krasnodar extend their lead to 2-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Volgograd.
In the minute 43, It's now 3-0 in Krasnodar as Shapi Suleymanov scores for Krasnodar.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, Krasnodar pushes forward through Tonny Vilhena, whose finish on goal is saved.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Oleg Aleynik (Volgograd) has received a yellow card from Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Krasnodar Stadium.
Murad Olegovich Musaev (Krasnodar) is making a first substitution, with Remy Cabella replacing Ari.
Krasnodar make their second substitution with Aleksandr Chernikov replacing Wanderson.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Igor Smolnikov with Cristian Ramirez.
Viktor Claesson is on a sub for Ruslan Kambolov for Krasnodar.
Volgograd make their second substitution with Nikolai Kipiani replacing Zurab Davitashvili.
In the minute 48, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Volgograd's half?
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 51, Krasnodar drives forward and Remy Cabella gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Viktor Claesson of Krasnodar is pulled up for offside.
Krasnodar's Aleksandr Chernikov is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Important block from the Krasnodar defence as Kamil Mullin fires in a strike for Volgograd.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In the minute 57, Volgograd awarded a free kick in their own half.
Volgograd awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 60, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a free kick to Volgograd in their own half.
Aleksandr Chernikov is booked for the home team.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
Krasnodar pushes forward through Cristian Ramirez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 63, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In Krasnodar Krasnodar drive forward through Aleksandr Chernikov. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball goes out of play for a Volgograd goal kick.
In the minute 65, Aleksandr Khatskevich is making the team's third substitution at Krasnodar Stadium with Beka Mikeltadze replacing Flamarion.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the away team a throw-in.
Volgograd have been awarded a corner by Alexey Valerievich Matyunin.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Volgograd.
Volgograd's Kamil Mullin breaks free at Krasnodar Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
In Krasnodar, Kamil Mullin (Volgograd) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Krasnodar.
In the minute 73, Krasnodar's Shapi Suleymanov breaks free at Krasnodar Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Krasnodar Stadium.
Alexey Ionov is replacing Tonny Vilhena for the home team.
In the minute 75, Alexey Valerievich Matyunin blows against Krasnodar's Viktor Claesson for offside.
Throw-in for Krasnodar at Krasnodar Stadium.
Shapi Suleymanov of Krasnodar smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Volgograd in the half of Krasnodar.
Armen Manucharyan is replacing Oleg Aleynik for Volgograd at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 80, Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
In Krasnodar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Volgograd territory.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Volgograd.
In Krasnodar, Remy Cabella of Krasnodar is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 85, Goal! Viktor Claesson extends Krasnodar's lead to 4-0.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin signals a Krasnodar throw-in in Volgograd's half.
Goal kick for Volgograd at Krasnodar Stadium.
In the minute 89, An attacking Krasnodar player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
2 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Volgograd in their own half.
Free kick for Volgograd in their own half.
Alexey Valerievich Matyunin awards the home team a throw-in.
Full-time! The final score is 5-0.
Krasnodar have extended their lead to 5-0 courtesy of a Viktor Claesson penalty.
